parameters.name: SortOrderIndex
parameters.description: 0 for primary sort, 1 for secondary sort, 2 for tertiary sort (see Remarks )

title: IBomTableSortData.ColumnIndex
description: Gets and sets the column index for the specified sort order index.

parameters.name: SortOrderIndex
parameters.description: 0 for primary sort, 1 for secondary sort, 2 for tertiary sort (see Remarks )

returns: 0-based column index mapped to the specified SortOrderIndex; specify -1 if the specified SortOrderIndex is not used
remarks: BOM tables may be sorted by up to three columns. This property maps one column to a sort order index. Call this property three times to set the sort order indexes of all three columns.
